key_risks: Profitability challenges due to high customer acquisition costs and claims payouts
Regulatory and legal risks from evolving insurance laws and data privacy regulations
Economic sensitivity to downturns and shifts in consumer priorities
Competitive pressures from new entrants and established players
controversies: Customer complaints about claim denials and premium increases
Negative public perception due to perceived unfair claim practices
social_issues: Customer dissatisfaction and negative reviews due to claim denials based on pre-existing conditions
governance_issues: Compliance risks with evolving regulations, particularly in international markets
